summary: Schizophrenia is a serious mental disorder.
full_text:
Schizophrenia Research is a peer-reviewed medical journal covering research on the aetiology, clinical diagnostics, and treatment of schizophrenia. It is an official journal of the Schizophrenia International Research Society and was established in 1988. The editors-in-chief are Henry Nasrallah  and Lynn DeLisi . According to Schizophrenia Research's original mission statement, the journal is aimed at
According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2011 impact factor of 4.748.
title: Schizophrenia Research
